name: Dots Net Crits
description:
Dots Net Crits is a mod for the Torque3D engine. It adds weapons, maps and gamemodes. The mod is in pre-alpha so there will be glitches. However, it will be in continuous development with new features being added periodically.

Gamemodes: King of the Hill, Predator, Zombies, Hydroball, Tag, All vs One, Diffusal, Ammoless, Skills, Hostage Rescue, Capture the Flag.

13 fun weapons such as the Shrink Shroom (make your target tiny) and the Noodle Blade (toss your target up into the air).

Other weapons: Bubble Mine, Dust Wand, Fist Club, Glass Bottle, Healer Rifle, HotDog Nade, Light Dagger, Lipo Rifle, Pogo Blade, Tele Dagger, Tele Mirror.
